name: market for cement, Portland Slag | cement, Portland Slag | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/20209/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;Total cement production in India during the year 2014-15 is 270.93 million tonnes. As per the goverment statisitcs cement industry grew at 5.6% in 2014-15. Nearly 41% of total cement produced in india were transported by rail (109.795 million tonnes).Reminaing amount assumed to be transported by road. In India, 70% cement dispatches are within the lead of 400 kms. This 70% data is used as representative estimate for the transport distances in the country. In this market, expert judgement was used to develop specific transport distance. This dataset does not consider cement import distance. 

A market activity start at the site of the production activities with the product being ready to be transported to the consumers unless otherwise stated.

A market activity ends at the site of the consumers unless otherwise stated.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2394:Manufacture of cement, lime and plaster

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data represents for all geographical loactions where cement has been produced in India.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: For this market activity mapping of all portland slag cement manufacturers and consumers in India has been done. The transport distance in this market are calaculated based on weighted average distance between manufacturers and consumers. Outcome of the mapping reseult were shared and verified with sector expert. It was observed that nearly 70% cement dispatches are within the lead of 400 kms.

exchanges.description: Mapping of cement manufacturers and consumers has been done and it was observed that nearly 70% cement despatches are within the lead of 400 kms. This 70% of data is used as representative estimate for the transport means distribution and transport distances in the country. Total cement production in India during the year 2014-15 is 270.93 million tonnes. Out of which 109.795 million tonnes were transported by rail. Reminaing amount assumed to be transported by road.
